headline: Podcast: Tough Times Come for Big Food
summary: Times are tough in big food. Industry giants like Kraft Heinz and General Mills are struggling with rising costs, weakened pricing power and budget-conscious consumers fed up with high grocery bills. Add to the list of pressures the precipitous rise of weight-loss drugs and the Trump administration’s “Make America Healthy Again” agenda, plus a once-booming snack business that has hit a wall.
